locations.name: The Bachelor Mansion (Villa de la Vina)
locations.description: The most iconic home in reality TV history, Villa de la Vina has hosted over 20 years of rose ceremonies, dramatic entrances, and romantic proposals.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: Spring for blooming gardens, fall for mild weather

faqs.question: Where is The Bachelor Mansion located?
faqs.answer: The Bachelor Mansion is located at 2351 Kanan Road in Agoura Hills, California, about 35 miles northwest of downtown Los Angeles.

faqs.question: Can you visit The Bachelor Mansion?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can rent the mansion on Airbnb for $6,000-$30,000 per night. It hosts weddings, proposals, and special events.

meta.title: Bachelor Mansion | Book the Iconic Villa de la Vina
meta.description: Rent the Bachelor Mansion for your own rose ceremony. The iconic California estate from The Bachelor is available on Airbnb.

locations.name: Playa Escondida Resort
locations.description: The beloved beachfront resort where Bachelor in Paradise couples have found love, complete with the famous Boom Boom Room.

faqs.question: Can you stay at the Bachelor in Paradise resort?
faqs.answer: Yes! Playa Escondida is fully bookable and actively markets itself as the BIP filming location.

faqs.question: What is the Boom Boom Room?
faqs.answer: The Boom Boom Room is the only air-conditioned room at the resort, famous for private couple time on the show.

meta.title: Playa Escondida - Bachelor in Paradise Resort | Sayulita Mexico
meta.description: Stay at the Bachelor in Paradise resort in Sayulita. Book the Boom Boom Room and experience 9 seasons of romance.

locations.name: Emerald Pavilion
locations.description: The stunning oceanfront villa that serves as home to Too Hot to Handle's contestants and the ever-watchful AI, Lana.
locations.address: Long Bay, Providenciales, Turks and Caicos

faqs.question: Can you rent the Too Hot to Handle villa?
faqs.answer: Yes! Emerald Pavilion rents for $8,700-27,000 per night and accommodates 18 guests.

meta.title: Emerald Pavilion | Too Hot to Handle Villa Turks and Caicos
meta.description: Rent the Too Hot to Handle villa in Turks and Caicos. Emerald Pavilion offers luxury Caribbean living from $8,700/night.

locations.name: Casa Tau
locations.tagline: The original Too Hot to Handle retreat
locations.description: The breathtaking Mexican villa where Season 1 of Too Hot to Handle made reality TV history.

faqs.question: How many guests can Casa Tau accommodate?
faqs.answer: Casa Tau sleeps 22 guests across 11 bedrooms.

meta.title: Casa Tau | Too Hot to Handle Season 1 Villa Punta Mita
meta.description: Stay at Casa Tau, the original Too Hot to Handle villa in Punta Mita, Mexico.

locations.name: Grand Velas Riviera Maya
locations.tagline: Where Love Is Blind couples see each other for the first time
locations.description: The stunning all-inclusive resort where Love Is Blind couples have their first face-to-face meeting after getting engaged in the pods.
locations.address: Carretera Cancun-Tulum Km 62, Playa del Carmen, Mexico

faqs.question: Is Grand Velas all-inclusive?
faqs.answer: Yes, Grand Velas is fully all-inclusive with gourmet dining, premium drinks, and 24-hour room service.

meta.title: Grand Velas Riviera Maya | Love Is Blind Resort Mexico
meta.description: Stay at the Love Is Blind resort. Grand Velas Riviera Maya offers all-inclusive luxury from $800/night.

locations.name: Andaz Maui at Wailea Resort
locations.description: The luxurious Hawaiian resort featured in Temptation Island, where relationships are tested against a backdrop of tropical beauty.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April-May and September-November for best weather

faqs.question: Is Andaz Maui on the beach?
faqs.answer: Yes, Andaz Maui offers direct access to Mokapu Beach and Wailea Beach.

meta.title: Andaz Maui Wailea | Temptation Island Resort Hawaii
meta.description: Stay at the Temptation Island resort in Maui. Andaz Maui at Wailea offers luxury Hawaiian hospitality.

locations.name: Sheraton Resort & Spa Tokoriki Island
locations.tagline: The closest you can get to the Love Island villa
locations.description: A stunning adults-only resort near the Love Island USA villa, offering the same crystal-clear Fijian waters.

faqs.question: Is this the actual Love Island villa?
faqs.answer: No, the Love Island USA villa is custom-built for production, but Sheraton Tokoriki is nearby and offers similar experiences.

meta.title: Sheraton Fiji Tokoriki | Near Love Island USA Villa
meta.description: Experience Fiji like Love Island USA. Sheraton Tokoriki offers adults-only paradise.

locations.name: Azura Beach Resort
locations.tagline: The new home of Bachelor in Paradise
locations.description: The stunning Costa Rican resort that became the new filming location for Bachelor in Paradise Season 10.

faqs.question: Why did BIP move from Mexico?
faqs.answer: The production sought a fresh location after 9 seasons at Playa Escondida.

meta.title: Azura Beach Resort | Bachelor in Paradise Season 10
meta.description: Stay at the new Bachelor in Paradise resort in Costa Rica.

locations.name: Grace Hotel Santorini
locations.description: One of the most romantic hotels in the world, featured in Bachelor fantasy suite episodes with caldera views.

faqs.question: Is this the hotel from The Bachelor?
faqs.answer: Grace Santorini and similar luxury caldera hotels have hosted Bachelor fantasy suite dates.

meta.title: Grace Santorini | Bachelor Fantasy Suite Hotel
meta.description: Stay at the romantic Santorini hotel featured in The Bachelor.

locations.name: Castle Howard
locations.description: The magnificent English stately home where The Courtship transported modern dating to the Regency era.
locations.address: Castle Howard, York, YO60 7DA, United Kingdom
locations.bestTimeToVisit: Spring for gardens, December for Christmas events

faqs.question: Can you visit Castle Howard?
faqs.answer: Yes! The house and gardens are open to visitors with tickets available online.

meta.title: Castle Howard | The Courtship Filming Location
meta.description: Visit Castle Howard, the stunning English estate from The Courtship.

locations.name: Esperanza Resort Los Cabos
locations.description: An ultra-luxury resort in Cabo featured in FBoy Island Season 2 and multiple Bachelor dates.
locations.address: Punta Ballena, Cabo San Lucas, BCS, Mexico

faqs.question: Is Esperanza the FBoy Island villa?
faqs.answer: Esperanza is in the Cabo area where FBoy Island Season 2 filmed, offering similar luxury.

meta.title: Esperanza Los Cabos | FBoy Island Resort
meta.description: Stay at the luxury Cabo resort near FBoy Island filming.

locations.name: Justine Restaurant
locations.description: The stunning French-inspired restaurant featured prominently in Dating Around Season 2.

faqs.question: Can you dine at the Dating Around restaurant?
faqs.answer: Yes! Justine is a real restaurant and one of New Orleans' best. Make reservations well in advance.

meta.title: Justine New Orleans | Dating Around Restaurant
meta.description: Dine at Justine, the romantic restaurant from Dating Around Season 2.

locations.name: Rainey Street Historic District
locations.description: The famous Austin bar district where The Ultimatum contestants explore relationships at bungalow bars.

faqs.question: Is Rainey Street a real place?
faqs.answer: Yes! Rainey Street is a famous Austin neighborhood with bungalow bars and restaurants. No booking needed - just show up!

meta.title: Rainey Street Austin | The Ultimatum Bars
meta.description: Visit Rainey Street, the Austin bar district from The Ultimatum.

locations.name: Amanpuri Phuket
locations.description: One of Asia's most exclusive resorts, featured in multiple Bachelor and Bachelorette fantasy suite episodes.

faqs.question: What makes Amanpuri special?
faqs.answer: Amanpuri pioneered luxury resort travel and offers unparalleled privacy and service in traditional Thai pavilions.

meta.title: Amanpuri Phuket | Bachelor Fantasy Suite Resort
meta.description: Stay at the legendary Thai resort featured in Bachelor fantasy suites.

locations.name: Four Seasons Bali at Sayan
locations.description: A stunning jungle resort in Bali's cultural heart, featured in Bachelor proposals and fantasy suites.

faqs.question: What's special about this Bali resort?
faqs.answer: Set in the Ayung River valley, this resort offers dramatic jungle views and authentic Balinese wellness experiences.

meta.title: Four Seasons Bali Sayan | Bachelor Jungle Resort
meta.description: Stay at the Bali jungle resort featured in The Bachelor.

locations.name: Blue Lagoon Iceland
locations.description: Iceland's famous geothermal spa has hosted romantic Bachelor dates with its otherworldly blue waters.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: September-March for northern lights, summer for midnight sun

faqs.question: Do you need to book Blue Lagoon in advance?
faqs.answer: Yes! Blue Lagoon requires advance bookings and often sells out weeks ahead. Book early!

meta.title: Blue Lagoon Iceland | Bachelor Date Destination
meta.description: Visit Blue Lagoon, the famous geothermal spa from Bachelor dates.

locations.name: Sandals Royal Caribbean
locations.description: A Caribbean all-inclusive resort featured in Love in Paradise and various Bachelor dates.

faqs.question: What's included at Sandals?
faqs.answer: Everything! Dining, drinks, water sports, entertainment, and even scuba diving for certified divers.

meta.title: Sandals Jamaica | Love in Paradise Resort
meta.description: Stay at the all-inclusive Jamaica resort from Love in Paradise.

locations.name: Conrad Maldives Rangali Island
locations.description: One of the world's most exclusive resorts, famous for its underwater restaurant and Bachelor proposals.
locations.address: Rangali Island, South Ari Atoll, Maldives

faqs.question: How do you get to the Maldives resort?
faqs.answer: Fly to Male airport, then take a scenic 30-minute seaplane to the resort.

meta.title: Conrad Maldives | Bachelor Proposal Resort
meta.description: Stay at the Maldives resort featured in Bachelor proposals.

locations.name: Queenstown, New Zealand
locations.description: The stunning New Zealand destination famous for Bachelor bungee jumping dates and dramatic scenery.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: December-February for summer, June-August for skiing

faqs.question: What Bachelor activities can you do in Queenstown?
faqs.answer: Bungee jump at AJ Hackett, jet boat on the Shotover River, heli-wine tours, and more adventure activities featured on the show.

meta.title: Queenstown New Zealand | Bachelor Adventure Destination
meta.description: Visit Queenstown, the adventure destination from The Bachelor.

locations.name: Scottish Highlands
locations.description: The dramatic Scottish Highlands featured in Bachelorette seasons with castle dates and highland adventures.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: May-September for best weather and longest days

faqs.question: Can you stay in Scottish castles?
faqs.answer: Yes! Many Scottish castles are now hotels or vacation rentals, offering the full Bachelorette experience.

meta.title: Scottish Highlands | Bachelorette Castle Destination
meta.description: Visit the Scottish Highlands featured in The Bachelorette.

locations.name: Paris, France
locations.description: The world's most romantic city has hosted countless Bachelor and Bachelorette dates, from the Eiffel Tower to charming bistros.

faqs.question: What Bachelor date spots can you visit in Paris?
faqs.answer: The Eiffel Tower, Seine river cruises, Moulin Rouge, charming Montmartre, and countless romantic restaurants.

meta.title: Paris France | Bachelor Romance Destination
meta.description: Visit Paris, the city of love featured in The Bachelor.

locations.name: Grace Bay Beach
locations.description: Consistently rated the world's best beach, Grace Bay is where Too Hot to Handle's paradise comes to life.
locations.address: Grace Bay Beach, Providenciales, Turks and Caicos

faqs.question: What makes Grace Bay special?
faqs.answer: Crystal-clear turquoise water, 12 miles of powder-soft sand, and warm year-round weather make it unmatched.

meta.title: Grace Bay Beach | Too Hot to Handle Paradise
meta.description: Visit Grace Bay, the world's best beach near Too Hot to Handle filming.

locations.name: Buckhead, Atlanta
locations.description: The upscale Atlanta neighborhood where Love Is Blind contestants live, date, and make decisions.

faqs.question: What Love Is Blind spots can you visit?
faqs.answer: Many restaurants and bars from the show are in Buckhead. The apartments are in various Atlanta locations.

meta.title: Buckhead Atlanta | Love Is Blind Neighborhood
meta.description: Explore Buckhead, the Atlanta neighborhood from Love Is Blind.

locations.name: Atlantis The Palm
locations.description: The iconic Dubai resort on Palm Jumeirah, featured in Bachelor fantasy suites and group dates.
locations.address: Crescent Rd, The Palm Jumeirah, Dubai, UAE

faqs.question: What's special about Atlantis Dubai?
faqs.answer: Underwater suites, one of the world's largest water parks, celebrity chef restaurants, and iconic Palm Jumeirah location.

meta.title: Atlantis Dubai | Bachelor Luxury Resort
meta.description: Stay at the iconic Dubai resort featured in The Bachelor.
